subject: your product sucks!!
description_text:
i have to say buying your product has been the biggest mistake i have ever
made...i have had nothing but issues weather your software
(SimPedalsConfig_V4) it never translates to english and always freezes,
doesn't even see the pedals or the Simsonn manager says they are two
old...just bought 2 months ago by the way. needless to say your
junk doesnt work and is a pain in the ass along with your customer service
is worthless. [image: image.png][image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi Lyc4n John,    In SIMSONN Manager 2.0.8, go to the update section and click on “Manual Firmware Update.” Then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder, open the pedals subfolder, and select the plus.sfu file to update the firmware.
